model
Class CardPlayManager

java.lang.Object
  model.CardPlayManager

public class CardPlayManager
extends java.lang.Object

A Singleton-type class that handles the playing of a card.

Method Detail

displayCardPlayError

private static boolean displayCardPlayError(java.lang.String message)
Displays a card play error message in a simple dialog box.

Parameters:
message - the error message to display
Returns:
always returns false (IE. the card was not played)

playCard

public static boolean playCard(Player player,
                               Card card)
                        throws EndGameException
Attempts to play a Card for the given player and returns whether or not it was played.

Parameters:
player - the player
card - the Card to play
Returns:
true if the card was played; false if it wasn't played or couldn't be played
Throws:
EndGameException - if the played card caused a player to win and ended the game

playCard

public static boolean playCard(Player player,
                               Card card,
                               Battle battle)
                        throws EndGameException
Attempts to play a Card during battle for the given player and returns whether or not it was played.

Parameters:
player - the player
card - the Card to play
battle - the currently ongoing battle
Returns:
true if the card was played; false if it wasn't played or couldn't be played
Throws:
EndGameException - if the played card caused a player to win and ended the game

playCard

public static boolean playCard(Player player,
                               Card card,
                               MonsterCard pursuer,
                               RunDialog runDialog)
                        throws EndGameException
Attempts to play a Card while a player is trying to run away and returns whether or not it was played.

Parameters:
player - the player playing the Card
card - the Card to play
pursuer - the Monster pursuing the player (the monster the player is currently running from)
runDialog - reference to the RunDialog controlling the player's attempt to run
Returns:
true if the card was played; false if it wasn't played or couldn't be played
Throws:
EndGameException - if the played card caused a player to win and ended the game

canCarryItem

public static boolean canCarryItem(Player player,
                                   EquipmentCard equipmentCard)
Returns whether or not a player can carry a specified item.

Parameters:
player - the player to check
equipmentCard - the specified item
Returns:
true if the player can carry the specified item; false otherwise
